Name: lat
Comments: Latitude, in decimal degrees, south is negative.

Name: lon
Comments: Longitude, in decimal degrees, west is negative.

Name: userhorizon
Comments: Height of the horizon at equidistant directions around the point of interest, in degrees. Starting at north and moving clockwise. The series '0,10,20,30,40,15,25,5' would mean the horizon height is 0째 due north, 10째 for north-east, 20째 for east, 30째 for south-east, etc.

Name: outputformat
Comments: Type of output. Choices are: 'csv' for the normal csv output with text explanations, 'basic' to get only the data output with no text, and 'json'.

Name: browser
Comments: Use this with a value of '1' if you access the web service from a web browser and want to save the data to a file.
